profile.title: Software Engineer (Backend Specialization) & Network Engineer
profile.bio: A highly skilled Software Engineer (Backend Specialization) and Network Engineer with 4+ years of experience in IT infrastructure and full-stack development. Certified in Oracle Cloud (OCI), AWS Cloud Practitioner and pursuing AWS Solutions Architect and Data Science, with expertise in Python, C and Linux systems. Passionate about building scalable solutions, optimizing systems, and contributing to open-source projects.

projects.name: Simple Linux Shell
projects.description: Developed a basic Linux shell in C that supports command execution, input/output redirection, and background processes. Implemented system calls and process management.

projects.name: Funding Manager System for Groups
projects.description: Building a system to help groups manage contributions, loans, and fund allocations efficiently. Implemented user authentication and transaction tracking.

projects.name: I'tikaf Registration System
projects.description: Designing and developing an online platform for I'tikaf registration, enabling event management and user registration with role-based access control.

projects.name: Voting System API
projects.description: Backend for a poll system. Built APIs for creating polls, voting, and fetching results. Designed schemas optimized for real-time computation and provided Swagger documentation.
